200.description: Get Account Referral Code for other users to use.A user can only receive one reference code. All reference codes are unique. If the user has a reference code, the existing one is returned.

201.description: Notifying the system of the reference code received from a user

200.description: Lists other users registered in the system with the users reference code.

get.summary: Get token balances for multiple wallets
get.description: Retrieves token balances for a list of wallet addresses for specified token type

parameters.name: tokenType
parameters.description: Type of token to get balances for

200.description: Successfully retrieved wallet holdings
Wallet address retrieved

parameters.description: Account ID to get balance for

200.description: Returns list of user NFTs

get.summary: Check wallets NFT purchases and assign raffle tickets.
get.description: Queries Magic Eden activities for the specified wallet (walletAddress). If any NFTs from the target collection were purchased and not already recorded, a new ticket record is created. Returns the users and the systems total raffle ticket counts.

parameters.name: x-api-key
parameters.description: API Key required for application authentication.

parameters.name: walletAddress
parameters.description: The users wallet address (e.g., a valid Solana address).

200.description: Returns both the users current total tickets and the systems total tickets.

get.description: Returns NFTs based on trait filters with pagination support.

200.description: Successfully retrieved NFTs

get.summary: Get all available trait types and their possible values
get.description: Returns all trait types and their possible values that can be used for filtering

200.description: Successfully retrieved trait types and values

Background.description: Background color or pattern of the NFT

Eye.description: Eye type of the NFT character

get.description: Returns the wallet address that users need to send funds to when depositing for games. This is the centralized wallet that receives all game deposits. Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

200.description: Game wallet address successfully retrieved.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

404.description: Wallet address not found for the application

get.summary: Get authenticated user balance for games
get.description: Retrieves the authenticated user's available balance for the specified token type. The response includes total balance, available balance (total minus blockages), any active blockages, and details about each blockage. This endpoint is useful for showing users how much they can wager on games. Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

parameters.name: tokenType
parameters.description: The type of token to get balance for (SOL, AFEL, WAA, USDC)

200.description: Balance retrieved successfully. Returns balance details including any funds that are blocked/reserved.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

404.description: Wallet not found for the specified account

get.summary: Get all token balances for authenticated user
get.description: Retrieves the authenticated user's available balances for all supported token types (SOL, AFEL, WAA, USDC). This is useful for showing users their total holdings across different tokens in the gaming platform. Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

200.description: Balances retrieved successfully. Returns an array of balance details for each token type.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

post.summary: Deposit funds for authenticated user games
post.description: This endpoint processes deposits to the authenticated user account for gaming purposes. It validates the transaction signature on the blockchain before crediting the funds to the user's balance. The deposit can be made in SOL or AFEL tokens, depending on the specified tokenType. The receiver wallet address must match the application's designated wallet. Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

201.description: Deposit successfully processed. Returns the transaction ID, previous balance, deposited amount, and new balance.

400.description: Invalid request - May occur when the provided wallet address is incorrect, transaction signature is invalid, or minimum deposit amount is not met.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

409.description: Duplicate transaction - This transaction has already been processed.

post.summary: Withdraw funds from authenticated user games
post.description: This endpoint processes withdrawal requests from the authenticated user account for gaming purposes. It validates the withdrawal amount against available balance and processes the transaction. The withdrawal can be made in SOL or AFEL tokens, depending on the specified tokenType. Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

201.description: Withdrawal successfully processed. Returns the transaction details and updated balance information.

400.description: Invalid request - May occur when insufficient balance, invalid amount, or other validation errors.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred during withdrawal processing.

post.summary: Withdraw funds from authenticated user slot machine games
post.description: This endpoint processes withdrawal requests specifically from slot machine game winnings. It includes slot machine specific commission calculations and processing. Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

201.description: Slot machine withdrawal successfully processed. Returns transaction details with slot machine specific commission information.

400.description: Invalid request - May occur when insufficient balance, invalid amount, or other validation errors.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred during withdrawal processing.

post.summary: Withdraw funds from authenticated user Coin Flip games
post.description: Processes withdrawals from Coin Flip game accounts with a 2% commission fee. The requested amount will have the commission deducted before processing the blockchain transaction. For example, if withdrawing 100 SOL, 2 SOL will be retained as commission and 98 SOL will be sent to the user's wallet. The minimum withdrawal amounts are 0.025 SOL for SOL tokens and 1 AFEL for AFEL tokens. Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

201.description: Withdrawal successfully processed. Returns transaction signature, transferred amount (after commission), balance details, and commission amount.

400.description: Invalid request - May occur due to insufficient balance, withdrawal amount below minimum limit, or invalid destination address.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

409.description: Duplicate transaction - This transaction has already been processed.

429.description: Rate limit exceeded - Too many withdrawal requests in a short period.

get.description: Retrieves the referral code for the authenticated user account. If the user does not have a referral code yet, a new unique code will be generated and assigned to them. Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

200.description: Referral code retrieved successfully. Returns the user referral code.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred while retrieving or generating the referral code.

post.description: Allows the authenticated user to use a referral code to establish a referral relationship. Once used, the user will be linked to the referrer and the referrer will earn rewards from the user future game activities. Each user can only use one referral code, and users cannot use their own referral codes. Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

201.description: Referral code used successfully. The user is now linked to the referrer and future game activities will generate referral rewards.

400.description: Invalid request. Occurs when the referral code is invalid, the user tries to use their own code, or the user has already used a referral code.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred while processing the referral code.

get.description: Retrieves comprehensive referral statistics for the authenticated user account. This includes their referral code, total earnings from referrals, number of people they have referred, and information about any referral code they have used. Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

200.description: Referral statistics retrieved successfully. Returns detailed information about the user referral performance and status.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred while retrieving referral statistics.

get.summary: Get Authenticated User Referral Earnings History
get.description: Retrieves the history of referral earnings for the authenticated user account. This shows all the rewards earned from users who used their referral code, including details about each transaction that generated referral rewards. Results are paginated and ordered by creation date (newest first). Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

200.description: Referral history retrieved successfully. Returns a list of referral transactions showing earnings from referred users, along with pagination information.

400.description: Invalid request parameters. Occurs when pagination parameters are invalid.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred while retrieving referral history.

get.description: Gets the authenticated user's daily free spin status. Shows total, used, and remaining spin counts. Returns zero values if free spin system is disabled. Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

200.description: Free spin status successfully retrieved.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred while retrieving free spin status.

get.description: Gets the authenticated user's free spin game history. Shows how much was won in each free spin. Results are paginated and ordered by creation date (newest first). Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

200.description: Free spin history successfully retrieved. Returns a list of free spin game records with pagination information.

400.description: Invalid request parameters. Occurs when pagination parameters are invalid.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred while retrieving free spin history.

get.description: Gets the value of free spins (in SOL). This shows how much each free spin is worth. Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

200.description: Free spin amount successfully retrieved. Returns the value and currency of each free spin.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred while retrieving free spin amount.

post.description: Adds a wallet to the freeSpin whitelist with specified daily limit. Only admin users can perform this action. Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

201.description: Wallet successfully added to freeSpin whitelist.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred while adding to whitelist.

delete.description: Removes a wallet from the freeSpin whitelist. Only admin users can perform this action. Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

200.description: Wallet successfully removed from freeSpin whitelist.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred while removing from whitelist.

get.description: Gets the list of whitelisted wallets for freeSpin. Only admin users can access this. Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

200.description: Whitelist successfully retrieved. Returns a list of whitelisted wallets.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred while retrieving whitelist.

post.description: Generates a timestamped message that users need to sign with their Phantom wallet. This message should be signed and then used in the token generation endpoint. Message includes a timestamp for security and expires in 5 minutes.

201.description: Authentication message generated successfully.

message.example: Please sign this message to authenticate: 1703123456789

post.description: Generates a new access token (6 hours) and refresh token (30 days) for the wallet owner. User must sign a message with their Phantom wallet to prove ownership. The accountId should be the user's Solana wallet address. Access tokens are used to authenticate game API requests. Refresh tokens are used to generate new access tokens when they expire. Each account can have only one active token pair at a time - generating new tokens will revoke previous ones. SECURITY: Requires valid wallet signature to ensure only wallet owners can generate tokens.

201.description: Tokens generated successfully after wallet signature verification. Returns access token, refresh token, and their expiration times.

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid wallet signature, expired message, or authentication failed.

post.description: Uses a valid refresh token to generate a new access token (6 hours) and refresh token (30 days) pair. The old tokens will be revoked and new ones will be issued with fresh expiration times. This should be called when the access token expires or is about to expire.

201.description: Token refreshed successfully. Returns new access token, refresh token, and their expiration times.

401.description: Invalid or expired refresh token.

post.description: Revokes all active access and refresh tokens for the specified account. This effectively logs out the user from all devices and requires them to generate new tokens. Useful for security purposes or when a user wants to log out from all sessions.

201.description: All tokens revoked successfully.

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid API credentials.

get.description: Returns the current free spin system configuration including whether it is enabled, the amount per spin, and daily limits. This endpoint does not require authentication and is intended for frontend applications to check feature availability.

200.description: Free spin configuration retrieved successfully.

get.summary: Get Slot Machine Odds and Multipliers
get.description: Returns the current slot machine symbol weights, three-of-a-kind multipliers, and special combination multipliers. This information is public and helps players understand the game mechanics and payout structure.

200.description: Slot machine odds retrieved successfully.

post.description: Initiates a slot machine game with the specified bet amount and token type. The slot machine generates three random symbols based on weighted probabilities. Winnings are calculated based on matching symbols and their corresponding payout multipliers. Two matching symbols result in a smaller win, while three matching symbols result in a larger win. The result includes the generated symbols, win status, multiplier applied, bet amount, win amount, and balance information before and after the game. Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

201.description: Game played successfully. Returns the result of the slot spin including symbols generated, win/loss status, multiplier applied, bet amount, win amount, and balance information before and after the game.

400.description: Invalid request or insufficient balance. Occurs when the player has insufficient funds to place the bet, the bet amount is below the minimum limit for the selected token type, or other validation errors occur.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred during game processing.

get.description: Retrieves the history of slot machine games played by the authenticated user account. Results are paginated and ordered by creation date (newest first). Each game record includes the symbols generated, bet amount, win amount, win multiplier, whether the game was won or lost, and the timestamp of when the game was played. Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

200.description: Game history retrieved successfully. Returns a list of game records including symbol combinations, bet amounts, win amounts, and timestamps, along with pagination information.

400.description: Invalid request parameters. Occurs when pagination parameters are invalid.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred while retrieving game history.

get.description: Retrieves comprehensive statistics about the authenticated user's performance in slot machine games for a specific token type. Statistics include total games played, wins and losses count, win rate percentage, financial metrics (total bet amount, total winnings, net profit), average win multiplier, frequency distribution of each symbol, and the largest single win amount. Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

200.description: Statistics retrieved successfully. Returns detailed gaming statistics including win rate, financial metrics, symbol distribution frequencies, and other performance indicators for the authenticated user and specified token type.

400.description: Invalid request parameters. Occurs when tokenType is missing or invalid.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred while calculating statistics.

get.summary: Get Detailed Slot Machine Game History
get.description: Retrieves a detailed history of slot machine games for the authenticated user and token type, including balance information before and after each game. This provides a comprehensive view of how each game affected the user's balance over time, allowing for detailed analysis of gaming sessions. Results are paginated and ordered by creation date (newest first). Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

200.description: Detailed history retrieved successfully. Returns comprehensive game records with balance tracking information, showing the exact balance state before and after each game transaction, along with all standard game details.

400.description: Invalid request parameters. Occurs when tokenType is missing, pagination parameters are invalid.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred while retrieving detailed history.

post.description: Places a bet on the coin flip game with specified parameters. Player chooses HEADS or TAILS, and places a bet. The coin is flipped and if the player guessed correctly, they win double their bet amount (minus 2% commission). The result, winning status, and updated balance information are returned. Each play generates a unique transactionId for tracking purposes. Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

201.description: Game played successfully. Returns the result of the coin flip, bet amount, win amount (if any), balance before and after the game, and other game details.

400.description: Invalid request or insufficient balance. Occurs when the player has insufficient funds to place the bet, the bet amount is below the minimum limit, or other validation errors occur.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred during game processing.

get.description: Retrieves the history of coin flip games played by the authenticated user account. Results are paginated and ordered by creation date (newest first). Each game record includes the chosen side, result, bet amount, win amount, and whether the game was won or lost. Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

200.description: Game history retrieved successfully. Returns a list of game records including result details, timestamps, and pagination information.

400.description: Invalid request parameters. Occurs when pagination parameters are invalid.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred while retrieving game history.

get.description: Retrieves comprehensive statistics about the authenticated user's performance in coin flip games for a specific token type. Statistics include total games played, win/loss ratio, total amounts bet and won, net profit, distribution of heads/tails results, and largest win amount. Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

200.description: Statistics retrieved successfully. Returns detailed gaming statistics including win rate, financial metrics, and result distribution for the authenticated user and specified token type.

400.description: Invalid request parameters. Occurs when tokenType is missing or invalid.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred while calculating statistics.

get.summary: Get Detailed Coin Flip Game History
get.description: Retrieves a detailed history of coin flip games for the authenticated user and token type, including balance information before and after each game. This provides a comprehensive view of how each game affected the user's balance over time. Results are paginated and ordered by creation date (newest first). Requires valid access token in Authorization header: Bearer <access_token>

200.description: Detailed history retrieved successfully. Returns comprehensive game records with balance tracking information, showing balance state before and after each game transaction.

400.description: Invalid request parameters. Occurs when tokenType is missing, pagination parameters are invalid.

401.description: Unauthorized. Missing or invalid access token.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected error occurred while retrieving detailed history.

type.description: Type of prize, e.g. FIRST_FIVE_GAME, DEFAULT, AIRDROP, etc...

totalBetAmount.description: Total bet amount for the game

nftCount.example: Number of NFTs held by player

totalBetAmount.example: Total bet amount for the game

destinationAddress.description: Destination address to send the money

tokenType.description: Type of token to AFEL ecosystem

accountId.description: Account ID to remove blockage from

totalItems.description: Total number of NFTs matching the filters

hasNextPage.description: Indicates if there is a next page

hasPreviousPage.description: Indicates if there is a previous page

itemCount.description: Number of items on the current page

items.description: List of NFTs matching the filters

accountId.description: Wallet address to add to freeSpin whitelist

dailyLimit.description: Daily freeSpin limit for this wallet

message.example: Wallet successfully added to freeSpin whitelist

accountId.description: Wallet address to remove from freeSpin whitelist
User wallet address (serves as both accountId and wallet address)

signature.description: Wallet signature of the authentication message

message.example: Please sign this message to authenticate: 1703123456789
message.description: The message that was signed by the wallet

userAgent.description: User agent string from the client

refreshToken.description: Refresh token to generate new access token

accountId.description: Account ID to revoke tokens for

betAmount.description: The amount to bet on this slot machine game (minimum 0.01 SOL / 10000 AFEL). For free spins, this will be 0.025 SOL automatically and betAmount is optional.

tokenType.description: The type of token being used for the bet (SOL, AFEL, WAA, USDC)

referenceId.description: Unique reference ID to ensure idempotency of transactions

demoMode.description: Demo mode - if true, no real money is used and winnings are not added to wallet

useFreeSpins.description: Use free spin - if true, uses daily free spin instead of real money (only for SOL, 0.025 amount). When useFreeSpins=true, betAmount is ignored.

betAmount.description: The amount to bet on this coin flip game (minimum 0.01 SOL / 10000 AFEL)

choice.description: The side of the coin the player is betting on (HEADS or TAILS)

tokenType.description: The type of token being used for the bet (SOL or AFEL)

referenceId.description: Unique reference ID to ensure idempotency of transactions

demoMode.description: Demo mode - if true, no real money is used and winnings are not added to wallet
